Edges-Harrowed -- Female Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Supernatural Attribute: +2 Attribute Points
Harrowed: +2 Spirit (Shaken recovery)/Immune to disease and poison
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-2 Survival: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Repair: (sma) d8 Taunt: (sma) d6
Gambling: (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d4-2
Language (English): (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d6
Skill Notes: Harrowed: -2 Persuasion/-2 Riding/-2 with animals
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Edge: 28
Features
Edges (16 points): Cat Eyes; Chill O' The Grave; Claws; Ghost; Harrowed; Hellfire; Implacable; Improved Cat Eyes; Improved Claws; Improved Stitchin'; Infest; Soul Eater; Spook; Stitchin'; Supernatural Attribute; Wither Hindrances: Cautious; Jealous; Loyal; Wanted Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Harrowed: +1 Edge Points (Harrowed edge)/Ignores 1 point of wound penalty/Doesn't breathe or drink/Smells of decay/May let the devil out for +6 trait and damage for 5 rd
Improved Cat Eyes: Increased Cat Eyes effects
Cat Eyes: No penalty in any lighting
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Ghost: May become incorporeal at will
Jealous: Has focused envy about one topic or person
Loyal: Always takes risks for friends
Wanted: Has trouble with distant law or minor infractions
Combat
Parry: 6 (2) Cover: 2 Toughness: 11 (4) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Heavy Armored Vest Shield: Medium Native Shield Weapons: Claws (d6+d8); Sawed-Off Double-Barrel Shotgun (3d6 R5"); Tomahawk (d6+d6 R3"); Unarmed (d6+d0); Winchester '73 (2d8-1 R24")
Combat Notes:
Claws: Claws are a natural weapon
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Harrowed: +2 Toughness/Ignore non-head Called Shot damage/Doesn't bleed out/Killed only if brain destroyed
Improved Claws: Increased Claws damage, AP 2
Improved Stitchin': Increased Stitchin' effects
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Chill O'The Grave: May spend a benny for a 3" radius cold blast that makes unprepared creatures vulnerable
Implacable: Takes extra wound before incapacitated
Soul Eater: May make Spirit-2 roll after inflicting unarmed wound to heal self wound or reduce fatigue
Stitchin': Make natural healing roll 1/hr
Arcana
Arcana Notes:
Hellfire: 9" cone inflicts 3d6 damage 1/rd
Infest: May summon and control insect swarm for 5 min
Spook: Targeted -2 fear check, suffer fatigue for 12" radius effect
Wither: Touch reduces target strength (Raise strength and vigor) 1 step for 1 hr
